flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $25 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
Todd made $510 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=510>>510
Todd has $535 before he pays his brother back because 25 + 510 = <<25+510=535>>535
After Todd pays his brother back he has $425 because 535 - 110 = <<535-110=425>>425
#### 425

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
